name: Super Mecha Brawl
description:
SUPER MECHA BRAWL!

A future where humanity lives in peace and harmony with each other, well... until they go to see the SUPER MECHA BRAWL TOURNAMENTS

W or ↑ - Jump/Fly

A or ← - Left Movement / Attack

D or → - Right Movement / Attack

S or ↓ - Special Ability

This game is a project for the Game Design courses of Media Design School.
